703579f-a.text:
59 Clarkson Ave., north side, between Flatbush and Bedford Aves., built in 1850, owned by John D. Burke, who kept the Abbey at Fulton Street at one
time. This house was demolished before 1936.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
703579f-a.folder: Clarkson Avenue & Flatbush Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703580f-a.text:
72 Clarkson Ave., south side, between Flatbush and Bedford Aves. The frame house in the center, is the John Lott's home, said to be in 1800 on
the Nag le Farm.
October 1928.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
703580f-a.folder: Clarkson Avenue & Flatbush Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

704260f-a.text:
Flatbush Ave., north from Woodruff Ave.
October 1928.
Eugene L. Armbruster Cellection.
704260f-a.folder: Flatbush Avenue & Woodruff Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
